snippet: Nearly 100 years ago, the authorities created maps identifying large concentrations of certain immigrant groups as part of a state legislator's efforts to root out socialists, communists and anarchists.
abstract: Nearly 100 years ago, the authorities created maps identifying large concentrations of certain immigrant groups as part of a state legislator's efforts to root out socialists, communists and anarchists.

headline.main: Police Demographics Unit Casts Shadows From Past
headline.print_headline: Ethnic Maps That Echo, Bluntly, a Modern-Day Police Effort
